poiToken.description: POI Token initial supply (18 decimals, in POI units)

tiers.description: Tier 0: 2 USDC per POI, 500,000 POI supply
Tier 1: 3 USDC per POI, 250,000 POI supply

tgeSale.description: TGE Sale configuration. Set saleStart/saleEnd to 0 to disable time window. minContribution/maxContribution 0 = unlimited

schedules.description: Example vesting: 1M POI, 30-day cliff, 180-day linear vesting, daily release, revocable. Set beneficiary to empty string to skip.

vesting.description: Vesting schedules to create after Vault deployment. beneficiary must be set to a valid address, or leave empty to skip creation

stakingRewards.description: Staking rewards: rewardRate (wei per second), rewardsDuration (seconds, 7 days = 604800)

rounds.description: Airdrop rounds. recipients array should contain {walletAddress, amount} objects. Empty array means no airdrop for this round.

airdrop.description: Airdrop eligibility configuration. Recipients will be used to generate Merkle tree.

earlyBird.description: Early bird allowlist allocations. Array of {account, allocation} objects (allocation in POI units, 18 decimals). Empty means no allowlist.

notes: All amounts are in human-readable format (will be converted to wei in scripts)
Time values are in seconds (Unix timestamp for saleStart/saleEnd, duration in seconds for vesting)
Empty beneficiary in vesting schedules will skip that schedule
Empty recipients/allocations arrays will skip those configurations
